name: Big Floppa Clicker
description:
You like cats??? Then you love Floppa. You like Floppa? Then you'll love Big Floppa Clicker. 

This is a small simple game I made. I like to take on big things but the problem with this is without a backbone of experience those are extremely difficult and prone to never being complete. 

My solution is to start with Tiers. I got inspired by the fantasy light novel Overlord. In that world magic exists in Tier 0-10 (plus super). To overcome a tier and move to the next is extremely time consuming and takes great effort. 

This is my first Tier 0 game. I plan to make at least 10 before I move to the Tier 1 game. For a game to be completed it has to be god enough for me to be not ashamed of it to even proud, then publish it.

The details are still fuzzy on what constitutes a tier but I intend to keep Tier 0 very simple with basic if any polish

Tier 1: Start menu & Settings (if music)

Tier 2: previous + definitely music and consider monetization quality

Tier 3+: ???
